notes: 35M+ document images spanning 240 years. Free Google-like portal. Model for PA counties.

fee_structure: Copies $0.50/page plain; $10.50 certified. Free account required for search/view.
notes: Free account creation required. Search and view at no cost; fees only for copies.

fee_structure: Free guest access for search/view. Subscription available for frequent users. Historical pre-1993 requires SearchIQS subscription.
notes: Free guest access 1905-present. Historical records pre-1993 need separate subscription.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: ~$0.10/min + $0.15/copy with prepaid account. LANDEX Webstore: free index search but paid document viewing.
notes: Most restrictive suburban Philly county. No free online viewing. Only in-person inspection is free.

fee_structure: Free Public Search Login shows watermarked documents. Downloads: $15/24hrs, $60/week, $195/year. Pre-1974 not available online.
notes: Watermarked viewing is free. Downloading/printing requires subscription. Pre-1974 records not digitized.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required for modern records. Historical records (1786-1967) available free through separate system.
notes: Split system: free historical access via separate portal; modern records behind LANDEX paywall.
Fayette County explicitly states 'there is no fee to view a public record.' Needs full classification of online system.
